Building is on 4.76 Acres
3 Story building of 77,511 sq. ft.
Abundant parking on-site with 290 surface spaces 
Exterior construction is masonry, block and stone; roof is insulated membrane with a spray down membrane
Air conditioning is 2 - 50 ton dual stage roof mounted units; heating is a mix of boiler and heat exchanger/ATU with some electric wall and baseboard heaters
Located near the I-75 and SR-562 interchange, 5 miles from Rookwood Commons, Pavilion & Exchange and 9 miles north of Downtown
